title: France panorama. [No. 73/23]
brief_description: French cinemagazine items including: 1. In the news: At the book festival - Guillevic receives the “golden eagle” of poetry. The art of living - French houses and interior decoration. Energy for the future - the “Tokomak” for the controlled fusion of hydrogen. 2. French fashions in Rio - Parisian haute couture in Brazil. 3. The arts: Soutine - Soutine retrospective at the Orangerie Museum. Masks and arabesques - masks and canvases by Zenderoudi
